title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4009.14 - Bookmaking prohibited
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4009.14 - Bookmaking prohibited

State Regulations

Bookmaking or betting, other than through the
pari-mutuel system conducted by a duly licensed association, is strictly
prohibited. Bookmaking is a misdemeanor under the Penal Law and is punishable
by a fine or imprisonment or both. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9

4009.14

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
